IMDb data; ttnr: 3006802, Title: Outlander, --- Description: Outlander: Created by Ronald D. Moore. With Caitriona Balfe, Sam Heughan, Duncan Lacroix, Sophie Skelton. An English combat nurse from 1945 is mysteriously swept back in time to 1743." data-id="main"/><script type="application/ld+json">"@context":"https://schema.org","@type":"TVSeries","url":"/title/tt3006802/","name":"Outlander","image":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BMDVlYTg5NjYtZGRkYS00NjdhLWI4MWUtNmU3MGQ3MWI1MWE5XkEyXkFqcGdeQXVyMTkxNjUyNQ@@._V1_.jpg","description":"An English combat nurse from 1945 is mysteriously swept back in time to 1743.","review":"@type":"Review","itemReviewed":"@type":"CreativeWork","url":"/title/tt3006802/","author":"@type":"Person","name":"mcampbelljh1","dateCreated":"2014-08-11","inLanguage":"English","name":"An excellent adaptation of the books for all us Outlander fans!","reviewBody":"I've recently been reading (actually listening to the audio-books) the Outlander series of books having completed 5 so far so when I saw the Starz TV series was coming out I just had to watch it. I must say I loved the Outlander books, but I'm not a fanatic when it comes to translating books to the screen they are very different mediums and thus can take on a different look and feel and that's OK with me. In this case, I don't think people who are would be disappointed anyway as the screen writers did an excellent job of translating the 1st part of the book to the screen (I've only seen the 1st episode but I'm already hooked so I'm sure I'll enjoy the rest). 

I loved their choice of actors to take on the roles of Jamie, Claire, Frank and Dugan. Sam Heughan is perfect as Jamie Fraser (just the right bit of good looks and ruggedness one might expect in Jamie). Caitriona Balfe also seemed like a good choice for Claire (beautiful yet strong enough to carry the role). I think Frank/Jack Randall's portrayal by Tobias Menzies will also fit my vision of Frank/Jack and I think he can carry off both roles one as the wicked Jack and the other as the loving yet dull Frank (when compared to Jamie). And the Scottish actors like Graham McTavish (Dougal) will bring old Scotland to life on the screen for me. 

From the 1st episode I think they producers will not be shy to include the more sexual aspects of the Outlander books, as they do have this erotic element that actually makes the love between Claire and Jamie the driving force of their relationship which allows it to span centuries, even when they are no longer together. It's that love/passion for each other that keeps them alive in each other's heart and so far to the directors credit, they have not been shy about adding it. I'm looking forward to the Claire Jamie love scenes hopefully to come... I'm also going to enjoy the Scottish history and scenery, and loved the way they so far have included it in the TV series. It's going to be very interesting to me especially as my ancestors are Scottish.

I know Starz will be increasing its revenues with this series' fans all signing up just to see it. There must be millions of us around the world that love these books and I'm sure like me many of them will order the cable channel just to watch this. I'm very happy to see Starz did such a good job in bringing this to life on the screen. So rarely do we get a good adult drama on TV these days, and this will surely be that. I'm liking many of the original show Starz is offering this season like this and Black Sails, Strikback. Who ever is heading their creative development deserves a lot of credit for their selection of shows to produce. I think Starz is catching up to HBO and Showtime in it's original shows and might even surpass them if it keeps producing shows of this quality plus they have a much better selection of movies that the other channels. As a new Starz member, I'd recommend it to others.","reviewRating":"@type":"Rating","worstRating":1,"bestRating":10,"ratingValue":9,"aggregateRating":"@type":"AggregateRating","ratingCount":140339,"bestRating":10,"worstRating":1,"ratingValue":8.4,"contentRating":"TV-MA","genre":["Drama","Fantasy","Romance"],"datePublished":"2014-08-09","keywords":"scotland,scotsman,year 1743,scottish highlands,sex scene","actor":["@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm1495520/","name":"Caitriona Balfe","@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm1537825/","name":"Sam Heughan","@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm3795370/","name":"Duncan Lacroix"],"creator":["@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0303436/","@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0410831/","@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0208971/","@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0601822/","name":"Ronald D. Moore"],"trailer":"@type":"VideoObject","name":"Season 6 Teaser","embedUrl":"/video/imdb/vi3784950553","thumbnail":"@type":"ImageObject","contentUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BZjVhNmU2YTgtZjg2ZC00MDRmLWI1MTQtZjMwMmY3YmZjN2YxXkEyXkFqcGdeQWxiaWFtb250._V1_.jpg","thumbnailUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BZjVhNmU2YTgtZjg2ZC00MDRmLWI1MTQtZjMwMmY3YmZjN2YxXkEyXkFqcGdeQWxiaWFtb250._V1_.jpg","description":"An English combat nurse from 1945 is mysteriously swept back in time to 1743."</script><metacontent=" --- Director: Metin Hüseyin, Stephen Woolfenden, Anna Foerster, Brian Kelly, Mike Barker

programme.title: Peggy Sue Casou-se
programme.desc: Peggy Sue é uma mulher de meia-idade, deprimida pela sua recenté separação com o marido. Na festa do 25º aniversário da sua graduação escolar, reúne-se com os antigos companheiros, que lhe contam como vai a vida de cada um.

programme.title: Murder, She Baked: Apenas Sobremesas
programme.desc: Hannah Swensen fica felicíssima quando é convidada para o primeiro Concurso de Sobremesas de Eden Lake, mas quando outro membro do júri, o Treinador Boyd Watson, é encontrado assassinado, Hannah propõe-se mais uma vez a descobrir quem é o assassino.

programme.title: Hailey Dean Mystery: Homicídio, Com Amor
programme.desc: Hailey Dean, uma antiga procuradora do Ministério Público, é agora psicoterapeuta. Quando uma paciente sua é interrogada sobre as mortes repentinas dos seus pais, o antigo trabalho de Hailey revela-se útil para provar a sua inocência.

programme.title: Candice Renoir
Candice Renoir
programme.desc:
Candice Renoir: Created by Robin Barataud, Brigitte Peskine, Solen Roy-Pagenault. With Cécile Bois, Raphaël Lenglet, Clara Antoons, Ali Marhyar. The story circles around French police officer Commandant Candice Renoir and her team solving different crime cases in a harbor city of south France. Candice herself is a mother of 4 children and recently divorced. Her daily routine is between solving crimes, taking out fights with her much younger female police superior officer, getting her kids to school - in addition - handling their problems too and keeping her team in line. It's a very funny and witty series with a lot of french charm and intelligent story writing. Not another dull crime series all over again. It's like a fresh french breeze on the TV screen. Candice is like a female Columbo version in high heels, handbag pink scarf and a 9mm in her holster." data-id="main"/><script type="application/ld+json">{"@context":"https://schema.org","@type":"TVSeries","url":"/title/tt2819924/","name":"Candice Renoir","image":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BOWM3YzUxM2UtZjIyMC00Zjg5LTk0NTMtNGQ3ZWQ0ODhlMTJjXkEyXkFqcGdeQXVyNjc0NTExNDI@._V1_.jpg","description":"The story circles around French police officer Commandant Candice Renoir and her team solving different crime cases in a harbor city of south France. Candice herself is a mother of 4 children and recently divorced. Her daily routine ","review":{"@type":"Review","itemReviewed":{"@type":"CreativeWork","url":"/title/tt2819924/"},"author":{"@type":"Person","name":"Doctor_Dexter"},"dateCreated":"2016-06-05","inLanguage":"English","name":"The female sitcom-detective cliché","reviewBody":"Over the last decades, in Europe, we've been swamped with the older female detective character with a family in tow. Some have a weak excuse for a husband to emphasise their strength, many others are independent single mothers who struggle with a demanding job and raising their kids. To be honest, I'm not a fan of the genre. Nothing against strong and independent women, au contraire. I just prefer decent detective work above being sucked into the personal life of a fictional character. If I wanted to see family drama I'd go watch a sitcom. It's beyond me why the detective genre has to be muddled with sitcom-esque fluff like this. (I wouldn't buy it, but it's programmed on TV *instead* of a proper detective). I can accept a modest degree of family life. After all, Beck and Wallander have families too. However, they are primarily detectives, and every episode is about solving the case. 

"Candice Renoir" is more sitcom than detectives. And it's just as tacky and kitschy as the name already suggests. A fifty-something big mama, who seems to think she's Brigitte Bardot in the seventies, miraculously becomes the team leader of a small town detective team. She blunders through everything, but 'magically' finds clues in fashion magazines and the likes. She's supposed to portray the strong and independent older woman who can do it all, kids and playing the boss- detective, but it's way to contrived to be the least bit believable. Her character, the rainbow team, the younger cutesy neighbour - who has stamped "love interest" in all caps across his handsome forehead - it's all a stylised light version of a concept we've seen many, many times before. And now it's here again, only worse. Yay. 

To be fair, the acting of the team and other characters varies from passable to decent, but the lead actress is really milking the diva character, and as such, overacting horribly in just about every scene.

It might just about do as daytime TV, on a rainy afternoon, but that's probably me being generous.","reviewRating":{"@type":"Rating","worstRating":1,"bestRating":10,"ratingValue":1}},"aggregateRating":{"@type":"AggregateRating","ratingCount":1103,"bestRating":10,"worstRating":1,"ratingValue":7.5},"contentRating":"TV-G","genre":["Comedy","Crime","Drama"],"datePublished":"2013-04-19","keywords":"france,female police officer,police","actor":[{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0092291/","name":"Cécile Bois"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0501845/","name":"Raphaël Lenglet"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm6511436/","name":"Clara Antoons"}],"creator":[{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0011107/"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0053077/","name":"Robin Barataud"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0043904/","name":"Brigitte Peskine"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm2784794/","name":"Solen Roy-Pagenault"}],"trailer":{"@type":"VideoObject","name":"Promo Bande-annonce [OV]","embedUrl":"/video/imdb/vi2892283161","thumbnail":{"@type":"ImageObject","contentUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BN2FhNWFlYmItYmE5My00ZmM0LThlZDctZGE5YjhiMThkZDQ1XkEyXkFqcGdeQXRyYW5zY29kZS13b3JrZmxvdw@@._V1_.jpg"},"thumbnailUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BN2FhNWFlYmItYmE5My00ZmM0LThlZDctZGE5YjhiMThkZDQ1XkEyXkFqcGdeQXRyYW5zY29kZS13b3JrZmxvdw@@._V1_.jpg","description":""}}</script><metacontent="

programme.sub-title: Chassez Le Naturel, Il Revient Au Galop
programme.desc:
Candice Renoir: Created by Robin Barataud, Brigitte Peskine, Solen Roy-Pagenault. With Cécile Bois, Raphaël Lenglet, Clara Antoons, Ali Marhyar. The story circles around French police officer Commandant Candice Renoir and her team solving different crime cases in a harbor city of south France. Candice herself is a mother of 4 children and recently divorced. Her daily routine is between solving crimes, taking out fights with her much younger female police superior officer, getting her kids to school - in addition - handling their problems too and keeping her team in line. It's a very funny and witty series with a lot of french charm and intelligent story writing. Not another dull crime series all over again. It's like a fresh french breeze on the TV screen. Candice is like a female Columbo version in high heels, handbag pink scarf and a 9mm in her holster." data-id="main"/><script type="application/ld+json">{"@context":"https://schema.org","@type":"TVSeries","url":"/title/tt2819924/","name":"Candice Renoir","image":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BOWM3YzUxM2UtZjIyMC00Zjg5LTk0NTMtNGQ3ZWQ0ODhlMTJjXkEyXkFqcGdeQXVyNjc0NTExNDI@._V1_.jpg","description":"The story circles around French police officer Commandant Candice Renoir and her team solving different crime cases in a harbor city of south France. Candice herself is a mother of 4 children and recently divorced. Her daily routine ","review":{"@type":"Review","itemReviewed":{"@type":"CreativeWork","url":"/title/tt2819924/"},"author":{"@type":"Person","name":"Doctor_Dexter"},"dateCreated":"2016-06-05","inLanguage":"English","name":"The female sitcom-detective cliché","reviewBody":"Over the last decades, in Europe, we've been swamped with the older female detective character with a family in tow. Some have a weak excuse for a husband to emphasise their strength, many others are independent single mothers who struggle with a demanding job and raising their kids. To be honest, I'm not a fan of the genre. Nothing against strong and independent women, au contraire. I just prefer decent detective work above being sucked into the personal life of a fictional character. If I wanted to see family drama I'd go watch a sitcom. It's beyond me why the detective genre has to be muddled with sitcom-esque fluff like this. (I wouldn't buy it, but it's programmed on TV *instead* of a proper detective). I can accept a modest degree of family life. After all, Beck and Wallander have families too. However, they are primarily detectives, and every episode is about solving the case. 

"Candice Renoir" is more sitcom than detectives. And it's just as tacky and kitschy as the name already suggests. A fifty-something big mama, who seems to think she's Brigitte Bardot in the seventies, miraculously becomes the team leader of a small town detective team. She blunders through everything, but 'magically' finds clues in fashion magazines and the likes. She's supposed to portray the strong and independent older woman who can do it all, kids and playing the boss- detective, but it's way to contrived to be the least bit believable. Her character, the rainbow team, the younger cutesy neighbour - who has stamped "love interest" in all caps across his handsome forehead - it's all a stylised light version of a concept we've seen many, many times before. And now it's here again, only worse. Yay. 

To be fair, the acting of the team and other characters varies from passable to decent, but the lead actress is really milking the diva character, and as such, overacting horribly in just about every scene.

IMDb data; ttnr: 2819924, Title: Candice Renoir, --- Description: Candice Renoir: Created by Robin Barataud, Brigitte Peskine, Solen Roy-Pagenault. With Cécile Bois, Raphaël Lenglet, Clara Antoons, Ali Marhyar. The story circles around French police officer Commandant Candice Renoir and her team solving different crime cases in a harbor city of south France. Candice herself is a mother of 4 children and recently divorced. Her daily routine is between solving crimes, taking out fights with her much younger female police superior officer, getting her kids to school - in addition - handling their problems too and keeping her team in line. It's a very funny and witty series with a lot of french charm and intelligent story writing. Not another dull crime series all over again. It's like a fresh french breeze on the TV screen. Candice is like a female Columbo version in high heels, handbag pink scarf and a 9mm in her holster." data-id="main"/><script type="application/ld+json">"@context":"https://schema.org","@type":"TVSeries","url":"/title/tt2819924/","name":"Candice Renoir","image":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BOWM3YzUxM2UtZjIyMC00Zjg5LTk0NTMtNGQ3ZWQ0ODhlMTJjXkEyXkFqcGdeQXVyNjc0NTExNDI@._V1_.jpg","description":"The story circles around French police officer Commandant Candice Renoir and her team solving different crime cases in a harbor city of south France. Candice herself is a mother of 4 children and recently divorced. Her daily routine ","review":"@type":"Review","itemReviewed":"@type":"CreativeWork","url":"/title/tt2819924/","author":"@type":"Person","name":"Doctor_Dexter","dateCreated":"2016-06-05","inLanguage":"English","name":"The female sitcom-detective cliché","reviewBody":"Over the last decades, in Europe, we've been swamped with the older female detective character with a family in tow. Some have a weak excuse for a husband to emphasise their strength, many others are independent single mothers who struggle with a demanding job and raising their kids. To be honest, I'm not a fan of the genre. Nothing against strong and independent women, au contraire. I just prefer decent detective work above being sucked into the personal life of a fictional character. If I wanted to see family drama I'd go watch a sitcom. It's beyond me why the detective genre has to be muddled with sitcom-esque fluff like this. (I wouldn't buy it, but it's programmed on TV *instead* of a proper detective). I can accept a modest degree of family life. After all, Beck and Wallander have families too. However, they are primarily detectives, and every episode is about solving the case. 

"Candice Renoir" is more sitcom than detectives. And it's just as tacky and kitschy as the name already suggests. A fifty-something big mama, who seems to think she's Brigitte Bardot in the seventies, miraculously becomes the team leader of a small town detective team. She blunders through everything, but 'magically' finds clues in fashion magazines and the likes. She's supposed to portray the strong and independent older woman who can do it all, kids and playing the boss- detective, but it's way to contrived to be the least bit believable. Her character, the rainbow team, the younger cutesy neighbour - who has stamped "love interest" in all caps across his handsome forehead - it's all a stylised light version of a concept we've seen many, many times before. And now it's here again, only worse. Yay. 

To be fair, the acting of the team and other characters varies from passable to decent, but the lead actress is really milking the diva character, and as such, overacting horribly in just about every scene.

It might just about do as daytime TV, on a rainy afternoon, but that's probably me being generous.","reviewRating":"@type":"Rating","worstRating":1,"bestRating":10,"ratingValue":1,"aggregateRating":"@type":"AggregateRating","ratingCount":1103,"bestRating":10,"worstRating":1,"ratingValue":7.5,"contentRating":"TV-G","genre":["Comedy","Crime","Drama"],"datePublished":"2013-04-19","keywords":"france,female police officer,police","actor":["@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0092291/","name":"Cécile Bois","@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0501845/","name":"Raphaël Lenglet","@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm6511436/","name":"Clara Antoons"],"creator":["@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0011107/","@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0053077/","name":"Robin Barataud","@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0043904/","name":"Brigitte Peskine","@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm2784794/","name":"Solen Roy-Pagenault"],"trailer":"@type":"VideoObject","name":"Promo Bande-annonce [OV]","embedUrl":"/video/imdb/vi2892283161","thumbnail":"@type":"ImageObject","contentUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BN2FhNWFlYmItYmE5My00ZmM0LThlZDctZGE5YjhiMThkZDQ1XkEyXkFqcGdeQXRyYW5zY29kZS13b3JrZmxvdw@@._V1_.jpg","thumbnailUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BN2FhNWFlYmItYmE5My00ZmM0LThlZDctZGE5YjhiMThkZDQ1XkEyXkFqcGdeQXRyYW5zY29kZS13b3JrZmxvdw@@._V1_.jpg","description":""</script><metacontent=" --- Director: Pascal Lahmani, Nicolas Picard-Dreyfuss, Stéphane Malhuret, Olivier Barma, Raphaël Lenglet

programme.title: Chesapeake Shores
programme.sub-title: The End Is Where We Begin

programme.title: Onde Reside o Amor
programme.desc: Finn, uma estudante universitária, vai passar o verão à Califórnia, na casa onde vive a sua avó e a sua tia. Tem de acabar a sua tese de doutoramento e refletir sobre uma importante decisão: se vai aceitar o pedido de casamento de Sam, o seu namorado.

programme.title: Rambo III
programme.desc: O coronel Trautman é feito prisioneiro pelas tropas soviéticas no Afeganistão. Em seu auxílio é enviado o único homem capaz de levar a missão até ao fim: Rambo.

programme.title: O Próximo a Abater
programme.desc: Após matarem dois membros da máfia russa em autodefesa, dois irmãos, católicos e irlandeses, tornam-se vigilantes e começam a eliminar os criminosos do submundo de Boston em nome de Deus.

programme.title: Dia de Fúria
programme.desc: Na Espanha do século XVI, o agente da lei Ruy de Mendoza investiga uma série de crimes bizarros e misteriosos, mas quando vê que se levantam muitos obstáculos ao seu trabalho, percebe que há uma teia maior de interesses por trás de tudo.

programme.title: Submersos
programme.desc: Enquanto James é mantido em cativeiro pelos Jihadistas, a milhares de quilómetros dali, a sua amada Danielle prepara-se para mergulhar nas profundezas do Oceano. Ao mesmo tempo, ela é atormentada pelas memórias do seu encontro breve em França, assim como pela incapacidade de saber onde ele está.

programme.title: Kung-Fu-Zão
programme.desc: Sing é um pequeno ladrão que sonha entrar no poderoso e prestigiado Gang dos Machados. Ao mesmo tempo, o gangue tenta apoderar-se de um novo território, uma rua sagrada, que é guardada por mestres de kung-fu à paisana. Instala-se então uma guerra entre os habitantes da rua e o Gangue dos Machados.

programme.title: O Amigo do Peito
programme.desc: Doug Harris é um noivo adorável, mas socialmente desajeitado, pelo que não tem padrinho. A menos de duas semanas do casamento, Doug pede ajuda a uma empresa que fornece padrinhos a indivíduos com essa necessidade especial...

programme.title: Duplo Team
programme.desc: Ao falhar uma missão, Jack Quinn, um agente antiterrorismo, cai em descrédito e é preso. Ao saber que a sua mulher é um dos alvos de Stavros, um criminoso, Quinn evade-se da prisão e une forças com Yaz, um traficante de armas, para resgatá-la.

programme.title: Rambo: A Vingança do Herói
programme.desc: Rambo, veterano do Vietname, regressa à selva para descobrir prisioneiros americanos, mas é atraiçoado pelo comando da operação e terá de escapar à sua maneira.

programme.title: Drácula: A História Desconhecida
programme.desc: Com o reino da Transilvânia debaixo da ameaça turca, o príncipe Vlad Tepes vê-se obrigado a fazer um pacto para se transformar numa temível criatura, ganhando o poder necessário para proteger a sua família e território. Esse pacto dá-lhe poder quase ilimitado, mas também uma eternidade atormentada.

programme.title: Outcast - O Último Templário
programme.desc: Gallain, um guerreiro misterioso, junta-se aos filhos de um imperador chinês deposto para destronar o seu irmão cruel, que procura vê-los mortos. Jacob, que enfrenta os seus próprios "fantasmas", também se junta a eles, procurando salvar o reino e colocar o príncipe no trono.

programme.title: Salt
programme.desc: Quando a sua lealdade é posta em causa, Salt foge e utiliza as suas aptidões e anos de experiência como agente secreta, de modo a não ser capturada. À medida que Salt faz de tudo para provar a sua inocência, mais dúvidas se levantam, continuando assim a busca pela sua verdadeira identidade.

programme.title: Fúria
programme.desc: Os aliados fazem a sua investida final pelo teatro europeu de guerra, numa altura em que a Segunda Guerra Mundial atinge a fase derradeira. Wardaddy, um sargento endurecido pela batalha, comanda um tanque Sherman e a sua equipa de cinco homens numa missão mortal por trás das linhas do inimigo.

programme.title: Rambo III
programme.desc: O coronel Trautman é feito prisioneiro pelas tropas soviéticas no Afeganistão. Em seu auxílio é enviado o único homem capaz de levar a missão até ao fim: Rambo.

programme.title: Um Ajuste de Contas
programme.desc: Depois de 19 anos na prisão por um crime que não cometeu, Frank sai em liberdade e decide fazer um ajuste de contas. A única coisa que poderá desviá-lo de ir avante com o seu violento plano de vingança, é o reencontro inesperado com o seu filho.

programme.title: Dead Trigger
programme.desc: Um misterioso vírus matou milhões de pessoas e transformou muitas outras em zombies sedentos de sangue... Incapaz de deter o vírus, o governo recruta jovens para formar um pelotão de elite: Dead Trigger.

programme.title: Relações Criminosas
programme.desc: Enquanto investiga uma série de assassinatos, um detetive de homicídios torna-se o principal suspeito quando o FBI descobre que ele tem relações diretas com todas as vítimas.

programme.title: Duelo Imortal - Parte II
programme.desc: No futuro, o espadachim imortal Connor MacLeod, que está a ser perseguido por extraterrestres mercenários, tem de prevenir a destruição da Terra, que vive quase na escuridão devido ao escudo criado para fazer face à degradação da camada de ozono.

programme.title: Regra de Silêncio
programme.desc: A vida de Jim Grant sofre uma reviravolta quando um jovem jornalista expõe a sua verdadeira identidade como ex-membro de um grupo radical antiguerra procurado por homicídio. Depois de 30 anos com outra identidade, Grant é obrigado a fugir.

programme.title: Anos 90
programme.desc: Aos 13 anos, Stevie tenta desfrutar do início da adolescência, ao mesmo tempo que tenta esquecer o relacionamento abusivo com o irmão mais velho. Em plena década de 90, descobre o skate e aprende lições de vida com um novo grupo de amigos.

programme.title: Uma Casa na Bruma
programme.desc: Massoud Amir Behrani é um imigrante iraniano que decide aplicar as suas finanças na aquisição de uma casa na Califórnia. Mas esta foi colocada à venda por um engano que a proprietária, Kathy Nicolo, não consegue desfazer, e as duas partes irão levar o confronto até às últimas consequências.

programme.title: A Vingança de Wyatt Earp
programme.desc: Um filme baseado na história real do lendário Xerife Earp. Conta como reuniu os melhores homens do Oeste para vingar o cruel assassinato da sua amada Dora.

programme.title: Fruitvale Station: A Última Paragem
programme.desc: Óscar Grant acorda a 31 de dezembro de 2008 com a sensação de que algo estranho se passa. Sem certezas, toma isso como um sinal para recomeçar a sua vida e decide ser um melhor filho, um melhor namorado e um melhor pai. Baseado numa história verídica.

programme.title: Golpe Final
programme.desc: Após um grupo de terroristas raptar a sua sobrinha num jogo de futebol, um ex-soldado, com técnicas de combate fatais, inicia uma guerra para salvá-la e evitar a destruição maciça.

programme.title: O Amor é Um Lugar Estranho
programme.desc: Bob é uma estrela de cinema a rodar um anúncio, Charlotte uma jovem que viaja com o marido, um fotógrafo viciado em trabalho. São os dois norte-americanos, mas cruzam-se no bar de um hotel em Tóquio. E de um encontro fortuito vai nascer uma forte amizade...

programme.title: Diário de uma Nanny
programme.desc: Recém-licenciada, Annie é pressionada pela mãe para arranjar trabalho no mundo dos negócios. Annie começa a trabalhar como ama de uma família rica e vai ter de aturar todos os caprichos da mãe e do filho, e evitar o pai. Tudo se torna ainda mais complicado quando se apaixona pelo vizinho!

programme.title: Girls Night
programme.desc: Quatro melhores amigas do tempo da escola reúnem-se, 10 anos mais tarde, para uma despedida de solteira selvagem em Miami. Pippa, uma amiga recente da noiva, também se junta ao grupo. A festa louca sofre uma reviravolta inesperada quando as cinco amigas matam acidentalmente um stripper.

programme.title: Don Jon
programme.desc: Jon Martello é um tipo de Nova Jérsia que se importa com o seu corpo, a família, os amigos, a sua igreja e, claro, mulheres. Os amigos até o tratam por Don Jon. Insatisfeito, embarca numa jornada em busca de uma vida sexual mais gratificante.

programme.title: Hitman: Agente 47
programme.desc: Hitman é um assassino de elite geneticamente modificado para ser uma perfeita máquina de matar. O seu alvo mais recente é uma corporação que pretende desvendar o segredo do passado do Agente 47 e, assim, criar um exército de assassinos ainda com mais poderes.

programme.title: CSI: Crime Scene Investigation
CSI: Crime Sob Investigação

programme.title: Insurgente
programme.desc: As fações estão a desmoronar-se. Beatrice "Tris" Prior tem de arcar com as consequências das suas escolhas e salvar aqueles que ama, bem como a própria vida. Ao mesmo tempo, lida com questões como a mágoa, o perdão, a identidade, a lealdade, a política e o amor.

programme.title: Da Série Divergente: Convergente
programme.desc: Tris tenta fugir com Four para lá dos muros de Chicago. Pela primeira vez, deixam a família e a única cidade que já conheceram. Do lado de fora, chocantes revelações desafiam Tris e Four, enquanto se desenrola uma impiedosa batalha que ameaça toda a humanidade.

programme.title: Mundo Jurássico: Reino Caído
programme.desc: A Ilha Nublar é agora um lugar abandonado, onde os dinossauros lutam pela sobrevivência. Quando o vulcão fica ativo, Owen e Claire preparam-se para salvar os dinossauros, mas descobrem uma conspiração que pode devolver o planeta à pré-história...

programme.title: San Andreas
programme.desc: Depois de um sismo de magnitude 9 afetar a Califórnia, um piloto, especializado em resgate e salvamento, e a ex-mulher tentam salvar a sua única filha. No entanto, isto é apenas o início, pois, quando eles pensam que o pior já passou, este está, na verdade, a começar.

programme.title: Focus
programme.desc: Nicky, um experiente burlão, reencontra Jess, a quem ensinou todos os seus truques. Envolvida no mundo das altas apostas de corridas de carros, a ex-aluna vai envolver-se no mais recente e perigoso esquema de Nicky... para deixar o mestre fora de jogo.

programme.title: O Atirador
programme.desc: Um atirador de grande perícia, retirado depois de ter sido alvo de traição, vive agora em exílio. No entanto, volta ao ativo depois de tomar conhecimento de um plano para matar o Presidente dos EUA. Novamente traído e acusado do sucedido, Bob enceta uma fuga e parte em busca do verdadeiro assassino.

programme.title: Maze Runner - Correr ou Morrer
programme.desc: Thomas dá por si num elevador, sem qualquer recordação. Quando as portas se abrem, depara-se com um estranho mundo onde só há rapazes da sua idade, que não compreendem como ali foram parar. Todos estão presos num labirinto e ninguém regressou com vida depois de o tentar transpor.

programme.title: Noite em Fuga
programme.desc: Jimmy Conlon, um mafioso assassino de Brooklyn, já viu melhores dias. Amigo de longa data do chefe da Máfia, Jimmy, atualmente com 55 anos, é perseguido pelos erros do passado e por um obstinado detetive da polícia, que o procura há 30 anos.

programme.title: CSI: Crime Scene Investigation
CSI: Crime Sob Investigação
programme.desc: CSI: Crime Scene Investigation: Created by Anthony E. Zuiker. With George Eads, Eric Szmanda, Robert David Hall, Paul Guilfoyle. programme.title: NCIS: New Orleans
Investigação Criminal: New Orleans
programme.desc:
NCIS: New Orleans: Created by Gary Glasberg. With Scott Bakula, Rob Kerkovich, CCH Pounder, Daryl Mitchell. Follows an NCIS team that investigates criminal cases involving military personnel in The Big Easy, a city known for its music, entertainment, and decadence." data-id="main"/><script type="application/ld+json">{"@context":"https://schema.org","@type":"TVSeries","url":"/title/tt3560084/","name":"NCIS: New Orleans","image":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BMjM3OTk1NTQyNF5BMl5BanBnXkFtZTgwMjU4NDQwMDI@._V1_.jpg","description":"Follows an NCIS team that investigates criminal cases involving military personnel in The Big Easy, a city known for its music, entertainment, and decadence.","review":{"@type":"Review","itemReviewed":{"@type":"CreativeWork","url":"/title/tt3560084/"},"author":{"@type":"Person","name":"elainecalloway216"},"dateCreated":"2014-04-03","inLanguage":"English","name":"Might be a good spin off","reviewBody":"I grew up in New Orleans and I'm an avid NCIS fan, so I was interested to see how they would handle the Crescent City episodes. Overall, I think it did really well. 8 points out of 10.

A few things: 1. In episode 1, there were a few mistakes that those people who are locals could easily notice. A little bit more research would've been better, but the plot/characters/etc. was good.

2. Bakula's ongoing "my brother, my brother" is too much. People in NOLA don't do that, if anything they say "cher" as an affectionate term for friend, so it seemed overdone on the show.

3. A little bit hard to believe in part 2, that a woman would leave a bar to walk in a dark alley alone with someone she had just met. No local would ever do that. 

4. I liked part 2 much more than part 1, because they focused more on places the locals go to and not just the "tourist top 10 spots" like in episode 1. I also loved how they talked about the city and it gets into your DNA. Great and well scripted.

5. Love the actors and think it could be a great series going forward :)","reviewRating":{"@type":"Rating","worstRating":1,"bestRating":10,"ratingValue":8}},"aggregateRating":{"@type":"AggregateRating","ratingCount":16860,"bestRating":10,"worstRating":1,"ratingValue":6.8},"contentRating":"TV-14","genre":["Action","Crime","Drama"],"datePublished":"2014-09-23","keywords":"usa,united states,investigation,naval officer,u.s. navy","actor":[{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0000836/","name":"Scott Bakula"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm1827376/","name":"Rob Kerkovich"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0001634/","name":"CCH Pounder"}],"creator":[{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0373192/"},{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0113138/"},{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0274041/"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0321782/","name":"Gary Glasberg"}],"trailer":{"@type":"VideoObject","name":"NCIS: New Orleans: The Fourth Season","embedUrl":"/video/imdb/vi1485290009","thumbnail":{"@type":"ImageObject","contentUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BNzNkZDYwZjEtMWNlZi00Zjg5LWJhYjktYmY0NzY0ODM2NjM1XkEyXkFqcGdeQXRoaXJkLXBhcnR5LXZpZGVvLXVwZGF0ZXI@._V1_.jpg"},"thumbnailUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BNzNkZDYwZjEtMWNlZi00Zjg5LWJhYjktYmY0NzY0ODM2NjM1XkEyXkFqcGdeQXRoaXJkLXBhcnR5LXZpZGVvLXVwZGF0ZXI@._V1_.jpg","description":"Promo"}}</script><metacontent="

Follows an NCIS team that investigates criminal cases involving military personnel in The Big Easy, a city known for its music, entertainment, and decadence." data-id="main"/><script type="application/ld+json">"@context":"https://schema.org","@type":"TVSeries","url":"/title/tt3560084/","name":"NCIS: New Orleans","image":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BMjM3OTk1NTQyNF5BMl5BanBnXkFtZTgwMjU4NDQwMDI@._V1_.jpg","description":"Follows an NCIS team that investigates criminal cases involving military personnel in The Big Easy, a city known for its music, entertainment, and decadence.","review":"@type":"Review","itemReviewed":"@type":"CreativeWork","url":"/title/tt3560084/","author":"@type":"Person","name":"elainecalloway216","dateCreated":"2014-04-03","inLanguage":"English","name":"Might be a good spin off","reviewBody":"I grew up in New Orleans and I'm an avid NCIS fan, so I was interested to see how they would handle the Crescent City episodes. Overall, I think it did really well. 8 points out of 10.

A few things: 1. In episode 1, there were a few mistakes that those people who are locals could easily notice. A little bit more research would've been better, but the plot/characters/etc. was good.

2. Bakula's ongoing "my brother, my brother" is too much. People in NOLA don't do that, if anything they say "cher" as an affectionate term for friend, so it seemed overdone on the show.

3. A little bit hard to believe in part 2, that a woman would leave a bar to walk in a dark alley alone with someone she had just met. No local would ever do that. 

4. I liked part 2 much more than part 1, because they focused more on places the locals go to and not just the "tourist top 10 spots" like in episode 1. I also loved how they talked about the city and it gets into your DNA. Great and well scripted.

5. Love the actors and think it could be a great series going forward :)","reviewRating":"@type":"Rating","worstRating":1,"bestRating":10,"ratingValue":8,"aggregateRating":"@type":"AggregateRating","ratingCount":16860,"bestRating":10,"worstRating":1,"ratingValue":6.8,"contentRating":"TV-14","genre":["Action","Crime","Drama"],"datePublished":"2014-09-23","keywords":"usa,united states,investigation,naval officer,u.s. navy","actor":["@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0000836/","name":"Scott Bakula","@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm1827376/","name":"Rob Kerkovich","@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0001634/","name":"CCH Pounder"],"creator":["@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0373192/","@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0113138/","@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0274041/","@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0321782/","name":"Gary Glasberg"],"trailer":"@type":"VideoObject","name":"NCIS: New Orleans: The Fourth Season","embedUrl":"/video/imdb/vi1485290009","thumbnail":"@type":"ImageObject","contentUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BNzNkZDYwZjEtMWNlZi00Zjg5LWJhYjktYmY0NzY0ODM2NjM1XkEyXkFqcGdeQXRoaXJkLXBhcnR5LXZpZGVvLXVwZGF0ZXI@._V1_.jpg","thumbnailUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BNzNkZDYwZjEtMWNlZi00Zjg5LWJhYjktYmY0NzY0ODM2NjM1XkEyXkFqcGdeQXRoaXJkLXBhcnR5LXZpZGVvLXVwZGF0ZXI@._V1_.jpg","description":"Promo"</script><metacontent=" --- Director: James Hayman, James Whitmore Jr., Michael Zinberg, Tony Wharmby, Mary Lou Belli

2. Bakula's ongoing "my brother, my brother" is too much. People in NOLA don't do that, if anything they say "cher" as an affectionate term for friend, so it seemed overdone on the show.

3. A little bit hard to believe in part 2, that a woman would leave a bar to walk in a dark alley alone with someone she had just met. No local would ever do that.

programme.desc: CSI: Miami: Created by Ann Donahue, Carol Mendelsohn, Anthony E. Zuiker. With David Caruso, Emily Procter, Adam Rodriguez, Rex Linn. The cases of the Miami-Dade, Florida police department's Crime Scene Investigations unit." data-id="main"/><script type="application/ld+json">{"@context":"https://schema.org","@type":"TVSeries","url":"/title/tt0313043/","name":"CSI: Miami","image":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BOTU3ZTI5ZGEtYjhiMy00ODU4LTgyM2UtNDhlYjBhMjc4MjIwXkEyXkFqcGdeQXVyMTYzMDM0NTU@._V1_.jpg","description":"The cases of the Miami-Dade, Florida police department's Crime Scene Investigations unit.","review":{"@type":"Review","itemReviewed":{"@type":"CreativeWork","url":"/title/tt0313043/"},"author":{"@type":"Person","name":"shaypack"},"dateCreated":"2005-11-08","inLanguage":"English","name":"Change the name to CSI: Vogue","reviewBody":"One person ruins this show: David Caruso. All he does is pose. They should make it into a drinking game. Every time he strikes a pose, take a shot. Of course, people have died from alcohol poisoning. This would only add to the statistics. All the other characters have depth. He just gets this look on his face and 'strikes a pose'. Watch him turn sideways and look over his shoulder. Wow!! OOOhhh, he figured out something. Time for him to take off his sunglasses. I challenge any of you to find an episode where he isn't positioned sideways looking over his shoulder and where he takes off his sunglasses. Quit posing and pretend like you know how to act!!!!\n\nAnd, how come he has to figure everything out? The other shows let the other characters show some brains. How 'bout letting the other CSI Vogue characters have a little spotlight?"},"aggregateRating":{"@type":"AggregateRating","ratingCount":55488,"bestRating":10,"worstRating":1,"ratingValue":6.4},"contentRating":"TV-14","genre":["Action","Crime","Drama"],"datePublished":"2002-09-23","keywords":"place name in title,city name in title,city in title,united states of america,usa","actor":[{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0000325/","name":"David Caruso"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0698346/","name":"Emily Procter"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0735226/","name":"Adam Rodriguez"}],"creator":[{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0054762/"},{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0183875/"},{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0048735/"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0231929/","name":"Ann Donahue"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0578856/","name":"Carol Mendelsohn"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0958499/","name":"Anthony E. programme.title: CSI: Miami
CSI: Miami
programme.desc: CSI: Miami: Created by Ann Donahue, Carol Mendelsohn, Anthony E. Zuiker. With David Caruso, Emily Procter, Adam Rodriguez, Rex Linn. The cases of the Miami-Dade, Florida police department's Crime Scene Investigations unit." data-id="main"/><script type="application/ld+json">{"@context":"https://schema.org","@type":"TVSeries","url":"/title/tt0313043/","name":"CSI: Miami","image":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BOTU3ZTI5ZGEtYjhiMy00ODU4LTgyM2UtNDhlYjBhMjc4MjIwXkEyXkFqcGdeQXVyMTYzMDM0NTU@._V1_.jpg","description":"The cases of the Miami-Dade, Florida police department's Crime Scene Investigations unit.","review":{"@type":"Review","itemReviewed":{"@type":"CreativeWork","url":"/title/tt0313043/"},"author":{"@type":"Person","name":"shaypack"},"dateCreated":"2005-11-08","inLanguage":"English","name":"Change the name to CSI: Vogue","reviewBody":"One person ruins this show: David Caruso. All he does is pose. They should make it into a drinking game. Every time he strikes a pose, take a shot. Of course, people have died from alcohol poisoning. This would only add to the statistics. All the other characters have depth. He just gets this look on his face and 'strikes a pose'. Watch him turn sideways and look over his shoulder. Wow!! OOOhhh, he figured out something. Time for him to take off his sunglasses. I challenge any of you to find an episode where he isn't positioned sideways looking over his shoulder and where he takes off his sunglasses. Quit posing and pretend like you know how to act!!!!\n\nAnd, how come he has to figure everything out? The other shows let the other characters show some brains. How 'bout letting the other CSI Vogue characters have a little spotlight?"},"aggregateRating":{"@type":"AggregateRating","ratingCount":55488,"bestRating":10,"worstRating":1,"ratingValue":6.4},"contentRating":"TV-14","genre":["Action","Crime","Drama"],"datePublished":"2002-09-23","keywords":"place name in title,city name in title,city in title,united states of america,usa","actor":[{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0000325/","name":"David Caruso"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0698346/","name":"Emily Procter"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0735226/","name":"Adam Rodriguez"}],"creator":[{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0054762/"},{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0183875/"},{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0048735/"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0231929/","name":"Ann Donahue"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0578856/","name":"Carol Mendelsohn"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0958499/","name":"Anthony E. Magnum P.I.
programme.desc: Magnum P.I.: Created by Eric Guggenheim, Peter M. Lenkov. With Jay Hernandez, Perdita Weeks, Zachary Knighton, Stephen Hill. An ex-Navy SEAL returns from Afghanistan and uses his military skills to become a private investigator in Hawaii." data-id="main"/><script type="application/ld+json">{"@context":"https://schema.org","@type":"TVSeries","url":"/title/tt7942796/","name":"Magnum P.I.","image":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BMzMzMGZjYjktNzNiMi00MDEyLWEyYzAtOWJmZTY1NGUyNTkzXkEyXkFqcGdeQXVyMjYwNDA2MDE@._V1_.jpg","description":"An ex-Navy SEAL returns from Afghanistan and uses his military skills to become a private investigator in Hawaii.","review":{"@type":"Review","itemReviewed":{"@type":"CreativeWork","url":"/title/tt7942796/"},"author":{"@type":"Person","name":"tinglis-90618"},"dateCreated":"2019-09-15","inLanguage":"English","name":"A Magnum with his own style","reviewBody":"We couldn't image anyone other than Tom Selleck being Magnum; however, Jay Hernandez puts his own spin on the character with his own charming style. programme.title: Sem Tempo
programme.desc: Num futuro, não muito distante, as pessoas param de envelhecer aos 25 anos e têm de trabalhar para comprar mais tempo de vida. Quando um jovem se vê com mais tempo do que aquele que poderia imaginar, tem de se colocar em fuga para escapar daqueles que lhe querem roubar o seu tempo.

programme.title: Chefes Intragáveis
programme.desc: Os respetivos chefes dão cabo da paciência e da alegria de viver de um grupo de amigos. Um dia, já embriagados, sonham com a possibilidade de se verem livres de Dave Harken, o chefe de Nick, um homem ganancioso e sem escrúpulos que se diverte a rebaixar os seus subordinados. Mas não ficam por aqui.

programme.title: Faz-te Homem
programme.desc: Quando James King é condenado por fraude e sentenciado a prisão em San Quentin, o juiz dá-lhe 30 dias para organizar a vida antes de cumprir pena. Desesperado, recorre a Darnell Lewis, um suposto vilão, para ajudá-lo a preparar-se para a vida na cadeia.

programme.title: A Turma da Noite
programme.desc: Um grupo de arruaceiros é forçado a frequentar a escola noturna, na esperança de passarem no exame para terminarem o ensino secundário.

programme.title: Crimes Perfeitos: O Salto
programme.desc: Num acesso de raiva, o treinador da equipa de heptatlo francesa mata o delegado da federação, que veio informá-lo que o seu contrato não seria renovado para os próximos Jogos Olímpicos. Para tentar esconder o rasto, o ex-campeão engendra uma estratégia que tem tanto de arriscada como de inesperada.

Cherif
programme.desc: Cherif: Created by Lionel Olenga, Stéphane Drouet, Laurent Scalese. With Abdelhafid Metalsi, Greg Germain, François Bureloup, Vincent Primault. programme.title: Crimes Perfeitos: A Vingança Serve-se Fria
programme.desc: Philippe decide livrar-se da irmã. Sabedor das alergias do cunhado, Philippe mata-o colocando amendoim no almoço, o que provoca um choque anafilático letal. Além disso, esconde o seu rasto ocultando a hora da morte. Delaunay e Mizon têm a tarefa de desvendar os segredos deste envenenamento bizarro.

programme.title: O Maravilhoso Jardim de Bella Brown
programme.desc: Um conto de fadas contemporâneo que se desenvolve em torno da mais improvável das amizades entre uma jovem agorafóbica e solitária, que sonha escrever livros infantis e um idoso viúvo e resmungão.

programme.title: Christmas In Evergreen: Tidings of Joy
programme.desc: Um escritor cético aparece em Evergreen para descobrir a famosa paixão da cidade pelo Natal, durante a busca por uma cápsula do tempo perdida.

programme.title: Christmas Under The Stars
programme.desc: Quando Nick é despedido durante a época natalícia, aceita um trabalho numa venda de pinheiros de Natal. É lá que conhece Julie, uma professora de astronomia que sempre procurou esperança nas estrelas. À medida que o espírito natalício se apodera dele, Nick descobre a alegria que é ajudar os outros.

programme.title: Chicago Med
Chicago Med
programme.sub-title: I Will Come to Save You
programme.desc: Chicago Med: Created by Michael Brandt, Derek Haas, Matt Olmstead, Dick Wolf. With Nick Gehlfuss, Marlyne Barrett, S. Epatha Merkerson, Oliver Platt. The city's most highly skilled medical team saves lives, while navigating their unique interpersonal relationships." data-id="main"/><script type="application/ld+json">{"@context":"https://schema.org","@type":"TVSeries","url":"/title/tt4655480/","name":"Chicago Med","image":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BMDUzNTBiZTUtZjBkOC00MzAyLTgxYTUtMjVkZDQ3MGUzNDE1XkEyXkFqcGdeQXVyODUxOTU0OTg@._V1_.jpg","description":"The city's most highly skilled medical team saves lives, while navigating their unique interpersonal relationships.","review":{"@type":"Review","itemReviewed":{"@type":"CreativeWork","url":"/title/tt4655480/"},"author":{"@type":"Person","name":"mel2718"},"dateCreated":"2020-04-10","inLanguage":"English","name":"An hour of entertaining tv","reviewBody":"I read other reviews slamming the show and everyone has a right to their opinion. My thought is, if you don't like it, don't watch it. I personally enjoy it, along with the Chicago franchise (Fire&PD). The crossover events are especially fun to watch. Is the use of accurate information on medication always correct? I can't say as I am not a doctor. I watch it because I like the characters and the stories. I'm sure there could be improvements, as with most tv. But this is not a documentary, its meant for entertainment. At least the characters have back stories. Lives outside the hospital. Dick Wolf has smartly created a network of series that all intermingle and its interesting to see how the New York shows come into play with the Chicago shows. So, just try it. And I don't mean to offend but to say it's like a soap opera is kinda funny to me because what is Grey's if not a soap? The city's most highly skilled medical team saves lives, while navigating their unique interpersonal relationships." data-id="main"/><script type="application/ld+json">"@context":"https://schema.org","@type":"TVSeries","url":"/title/tt4655480/","name":"Chicago Med","image":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BMDUzNTBiZTUtZjBkOC00MzAyLTgxYTUtMjVkZDQ3MGUzNDE1XkEyXkFqcGdeQXVyODUxOTU0OTg@._V1_.jpg","description":"The city's most highly skilled medical team saves lives, while navigating their unique interpersonal relationships.","review":"@type":"Review","itemReviewed":"@type":"CreativeWork","url":"/title/tt4655480/","author":"@type":"Person","name":"mel2718","dateCreated":"2020-04-10","inLanguage":"English","name":"An hour of entertaining tv","reviewBody":"I read other reviews slamming the show and everyone has a right to their opinion. My thought is, if you don't like it, don't watch it. I personally enjoy it, along with the Chicago franchise (Fire&PD). The crossover events are especially fun to watch. Is the use of accurate information on medication always correct? I can't say as I am not a doctor. I watch it because I like the characters and the stories. I'm sure there could be improvements, as with most tv. But this is not a documentary, its meant for entertainment. At least the characters have back stories. Lives outside the hospital. Dick Wolf has smartly created a network of series that all intermingle and its interesting to see how the New York shows come into play with the Chicago shows. So, just try it. And I don't mean to offend but to say it's like a soap opera is kinda funny to me because what is Grey's if not a soap? Most medical dramas have an element of such as well as miraculous cures at the end of the hour.","reviewRating":"@type":"Rating","worstRating":1,"bestRating":10,"ratingValue":8,"aggregateRating":"@type":"AggregateRating","ratingCount":21196,"bestRating":10,"worstRating":1,"ratingValue":7.6,"contentRating":"TV-14","genre":["Drama"],"datePublished":"2015-11-17","keywords":"shared universe,doctor,emergency room,hospital,medical profession","actor":["@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm3674742/","name":"Nick Gehlfuss","@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0012679/","name":"Marlyne Barrett","@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0580924/","name":"S. The city's most highly skilled medical team saves lives, while navigating their unique interpersonal relationships." data-id="main"/><script type="application/ld+json">"@context":"https://schema.org","@type":"TVSeries","url":"/title/tt4655480/","name":"Chicago Med","image":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BMDUzNTBiZTUtZjBkOC00MzAyLTgxYTUtMjVkZDQ3MGUzNDE1XkEyXkFqcGdeQXVyODUxOTU0OTg@._V1_.jpg","description":"The city's most highly skilled medical team saves lives, while navigating their unique interpersonal relationships.","review":"@type":"Review","itemReviewed":"@type":"CreativeWork","url":"/title/tt4655480/","author":"@type":"Person","name":"mel2718","dateCreated":"2020-04-10","inLanguage":"English","name":"An hour of entertaining tv","reviewBody":"I read other reviews slamming the show and everyone has a right to their opinion. My thought is, if you don't like it, don't watch it. I personally enjoy it, along with the Chicago franchise (Fire&PD). The crossover events are especially fun to watch. Is the use of accurate information on medication always correct? I can't say as I am not a doctor. I watch it because I like the characters and the stories. I'm sure there could be improvements, as with most tv. But this is not a documentary, its meant for entertainment. At least the characters have back stories. Lives outside the hospital. Dick Wolf has smartly created a network of series that all intermingle and its interesting to see how the New York shows come into play with the Chicago shows. So, just try it. And I don't mean to offend but to say it's like a soap opera is kinda funny to me because what is Grey's if not a soap? Most medical dramas have an element of such as well as miraculous cures at the end of the hour.","reviewRating":"@type":"Rating","worstRating":1,"bestRating":10,"ratingValue":8,"aggregateRating":"@type":"AggregateRating","ratingCount":21196,"bestRating":10,"worstRating":1,"ratingValue":7.6,"contentRating":"TV-14","genre":["Drama"],"datePublished":"2015-11-17","keywords":"shared universe,doctor,emergency room,hospital,medical profession","actor":["@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm3674742/","name":"Nick Gehlfuss","@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0012679/","name":"Marlyne Barrett","@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0580924/","name":"S. programme.title: Marry Me At Christmas
programme.desc: Na pequena cidade de Fool's Gold, Madeline Krug, dona de uma loja de noivas, tem a missão de planear o casamento da irmã do seu ídolo Jonny Blaze. Enquanto Madeline tenta perceber se os sentimentos por Jonny são reais, ele está dividido entre o seu novo filme e encontrar uma casa em Fool's Gold.

programme.title: Welcome To Christmas
programme.desc: O xerife Gage McBride e os residentes da localidade de Christmas, no Colorado, fazem tudo para convencer Madison Lane a construir o resort da empresa nas redondezas. Madison, que é viciada em trabalho, acaba por se apaixonar pela cidade pitoresca, pelo xerife viúvo e bem-parecido e pela sua família.

programme.title: A Christmas Duet
programme.desc: Durante a confusão que é planear um festival de Natal e concorrer ao prémio de melhor alojamento de inverno, a dona de uma estalagem redescobre o amor pela música e, pelo caminho, o amor pelo seu antigo parceiro musical.

programme.title: A Lista dos Ex
programme.desc: Quando Ally Darling lê um artigo, fica em pânico e acredita que vai ficar sozinha para sempre! Para evitar o seu destino fatal, começa uma louca aventura para descobrir qual terá sido o seu melhor ex-namorado. No entanto, a resposta para a sua felicidade pode estar onde menos espera...

programme.title: Enquanto Estiveres Aí...
programme.desc: Elizabeth tem um trágico acidente de carro e fica em coma. David, um jovem viúvo, arrenda o apartamento dela. Quando se muda, o espírito de Elizabeth começa a assombrá-lo, não tendo memória do acidente ou de quem é. Para tentar resolver o conflito, ele compromete-se a descobrir quem ela realmente é.

programme.title: A Proposta
programme.desc: Prestes a ser deportada, a controladora Margaret anuncia que está noiva do seu assistente Andrew, que não sabe de nada. Após algumas exigências, o casal parte para o Alasca, onde tem de convencer a excêntrica família de Andrew e um agente da imigração, altamente cético, de que a farsa é real.

programme.title: As Cinquenta Sombras de Grey
programme.desc: Anastasia sempre teve dificuldades em relacionar-se com o sexo oposto. Certo dia, entrevista Christian Grey, um dos empresários mais promissores do momento. À medida que ficam mais próximos, ela dá conta de que Christian não é uma pessoa comum. Nasce assim uma complexa relação erótica e emocional...

programme.title: Home Is Where The Killer Is
programme.desc: Após um susto relacionado com a sua saúde e a dolorosa separação do namorado, Nicole está prestes a ser despejada. Quando descobre que a médica Julie Thomason tem um quarto para arrendar, encontra nela uma amiga. Porém, Nicole não desconfia até onde Julie poderá ir para controlar esta amizade.

programme.title: My Evil Stepdad
programme.desc: Ashley fica entusiasmada quando a mãe, Tracy, se apaixona e casa com Jared, um empresário bem-sucedido. Até que Jared começa a empurrar Ashley para fora das suas vidas. Quando os motivos perigosos de Jared vêm ao de cima, Ashley tem de encontrar uma forma de o deter antes que seja tarde demais.

programme.title: A Novel Romance
programme.desc: Filho de atores, Liam Bradley foi criado numa casa de celebridades. Quando os pais morreram num acidente trágico, os holofotes acenderam-se ainda mais sobre ele, o que fez com que ele escolhesse um pseudónimo para a sua carreira como escritor. Sophie e Liam conhecem-se num voo e ficam apaixonados.

programme.title: Fatal Flatline
programme.desc: Uma mãe entra em contacto com o casal que doou o coração para o transplante da filha. Porém, quanto mais tempo passa com eles, mais caos lança sobre as suas vidas outrora pacatas.

programme.title: Snatched From Mommy
programme.desc: Elizabeth começa um blogue de parentalidade para documentar todas as tentativas e erros inerentes ao papel de mãe e pai, mas quando começa a receber mensagens abusivas começa a duvidar da sua decisão. O assédio vai de mal a pior e ela começa a perguntar-se se o atacante tem um motivo pessoal.

programme.title: Chicago Med
Chicago Med
programme.desc: Chicago Med: Created by Michael Brandt, Derek Haas, Matt Olmstead, Dick Wolf. With Nick Gehlfuss, Marlyne Barrett, S. Epatha Merkerson, Oliver Platt. The city's most highly skilled medical team saves lives, while navigating their unique interpersonal relationships." data-id="main"/><script type="application/ld+json">{"@context":"https://schema.org","@type":"TVSeries","url":"/title/tt4655480/","name":"Chicago Med","image":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BMDUzNTBiZTUtZjBkOC00MzAyLTgxYTUtMjVkZDQ3MGUzNDE1XkEyXkFqcGdeQXVyODUxOTU0OTg@._V1_.jpg","description":"The city's most highly skilled medical team saves lives, while navigating their unique interpersonal relationships.","review":{"@type":"Review","itemReviewed":{"@type":"CreativeWork","url":"/title/tt4655480/"},"author":{"@type":"Person","name":"mel2718"},"dateCreated":"2020-04-10","inLanguage":"English","name":"An hour of entertaining tv","reviewBody":"I read other reviews slamming the show and everyone has a right to their opinion. My thought is, if you don't like it, don't watch it. I personally enjoy it, along with the Chicago franchise (Fire&PD). The crossover events are especially fun to watch. Is the use of accurate information on medication always correct? I can't say as I am not a doctor. I watch it because I like the characters and the stories. I'm sure there could be improvements, as with most tv. But this is not a documentary, its meant for entertainment. At least the characters have back stories. Lives outside the hospital. Dick Wolf has smartly created a network of series that all intermingle and its interesting to see how the New York shows come into play with the Chicago shows. So, just try it. And I don't mean to offend but to say it's like a soap opera is kinda funny to me because what is Grey's if not a soap? Most medical dramas have an element of such as well as miraculous cures at the end of the hour.","reviewRating":{"@type":"Rating","worstRating":1,"bestRating":10,"ratingValue":8}},"aggregateRating":{"@type":"AggregateRating","ratingCount":21196,"bestRating":10,"worstRating":1,"ratingValue":7.6},"contentRating":"TV-14","genre":["Drama"],"datePublished":"2015-11-17","keywords":"shared universe,doctor,emergency room,hospital,medical profession","actor":[{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm3674742/","name":"Nick Gehlfuss"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0012679/","name":"Marlyne Barrett"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0580924/","name":"S.
